column6: I'm going away tomorrow.  I'll be away for a few days.  Back on Wednesday.

column3: Applications for the job must be received {{c1::by}} 18th October.
column6: I don't know whether to apply for the job or not.  The latest date to apply is the eighteenth of October.
I spent yesterday evening watching TV.  At midnight, I was tired, switched off the TV and went to bed.
I'm just going out.  I've got a few things to do, but I won't be long.  It's 11 o’clock now, and I won't be longer than an hour.
My train was delayed last night.  It was supposed to get here at 10.30, but it was two hours late.  I finally got home at 1 o'clock.

column3: He drove quite fast. He got there {{c1::by}} 3 o'clock.
column6: I went to see a friend who lives in a town about 50 miles away.  The trip was quicker than usual as there wasn't much traffic and I drove quite fast.  I left at 2.15, and 45 minutes later I was sitting in my friend's house.
